name: Bu1let
description:
Bu1let is a singleplayer fighting game! Your only objective is to shoot all of the enemies with a singular bullet. After your shot has been fired, a bullet will randomly appear in the map!

INPUT TYPE:

Singleplayer
Keyboard / Controller

CONTROLS:

ControlControllerKeyboardRight
Left Stick (Right)
DLeft
Left Stick (Left)
AJump
Xbox A / PS Cross 
W / Space
ShootXbox B / PS CircleLeft Click
